DESCRIPTION: Allows you to search for information about the a specific recipe.
EXAMPLES:
{{prefix}}recipe Axe of the abyss
{{prefix}}recipe Axe of the abyss 10
NOT_FOUND: This recipe isn't yet in our database or this is not a recipe. Try with another recipe.
NO_ARGS: You must enter a recipe to search
NO_TERRITORY: The Territory Mission system is in progress, try later.
